name: 江怡君
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

scorePolicy:
以下說明如有任何疑義或未說明周全之處，授課教師留有最終及惟一解釋權。
Total grade of Remedial English Teaching * 21% (輔導課程總成績)
Average of (Mid-term Exam + Final Exam) * 20% (期中考加期末考平均)
Average of Weekly Quizzes * 29% (每週小考)
Mid-term Campus-wide English Proficiency Test * 15% (期中會考)
Mid-term Campus-wide English Proficiency Test * 15* (期中會考)
Freedom Writer (optional)

(預習和作業) Students are required to preview assigned reading and do homework. The instructor will check students’ notes and homework at irregular intervals. If a student is found to not have done the preview or homework, 20 points will be deducted from his or her quiz that week.

(小考和補考) Quizzes are always administered at the beginning of the class. Late students can ask for make-up quizzes administered by the teaching assistant, but 20 points will be automatically deducted. An absent student, with or without a justifiable reason, cannot ask for a make-up quiz. Yet, for all students, one lowest quiz grade needs not to be factored into the average calculation.

(小老師) Teaching assistant will be awarded 3 bonus points to his or her final grade.

(作弊及抄襲) Any student caught cheating or plagiarizing in quizzes, exams, or skits will be given a zero for his or her final grade without any room of negotiation.
materials: Interactions 1—Reading (by E. Kirn & P. Hartmann, McGraw Hill)
